article_title: A Revolution in U.S. Military Strategy, Part I

article_metadata.description: Mounting global volatility, complexity, savagery and peril appears to make future military planning very difficult—but only if the approach is tactical in contrast to strategic.
article_metadata.author: Prometheus On The Ledge
